pullRequest.title: Invalidate duties for epoch+2 and beyond when a new block is imported
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
When a block at epoch x is imported, the validator client needs to invalidate duties for epoch x+2 and later as the randao mix will have changed.
Normally this has no effect as we wouldn't schedule duties that far ahead, but if we thought we were in sync and then discovered blocks from more than an epoch ago that we didn't have, we may need to recalculate some duties.
Fixed Issue(s)
fixes #2096
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.
